mapper.select: SELECT a.category_id,a.parent as parentId,a.name ,(case when a.parent is null then ifnull(parentcount,0) else ifnull(itemcount,0) end) itemCount from ( SELECT c.CATEGORY_ID ,c.PARENT ,c.NAME,itemcount from category c left outer join ( select CATEGORY_ID , count(*) itemcount from item_category group by CATEGORY_ID ) ic on c.CATEGORY_ID = ic.CATEGORY_ID ) a left outer join ( SELECT c.PARENT ,sum(cnt) parentcount from category c left outer join ( select CATEGORY_ID , count(*) cnt from item_category group by CATEGORY_ID ) ic on c.CATEGORY_ID = ic.CATEGORY_ID where parent is not null group by parent ) b on a.category_id = b.parent ;
